subSubSection.paragraph: 114 .- P. s t y g i a Chappuis, 1926 .
Syn.: Parabathynella phreatica Chappuis, 1939 (of Skoplje). Type locality: Sveta Voda, Cacak, Serbia .

Other localities: spring near Neuchâtel, Switzerland ; spring near Svinita (Danube valley) and Baile Herculane (Cerna, valley), Romania ; near Skoplje, Macedonia ; Tskhaltubo- Tsageri, Republic of Georgia ; several river and springs in central Slovakia (near to Zagreb) and Budapest, Hungary .
Habitat: S, W, C and I.
